data.name: Presenter Slides™ - License
data.detailed_description:
Official license for Presenter Slides™


  • Appear professional in front of your colleagues by purchasing this commercial license*
  • Support the starving interns
  • Boost quarterly revenue
  • Tax deductible

*The sky is not included. We would sell it to you if we could, but our lawyers tell us otherwise.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Additional Notes: A Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Additional Notes: A Webcam
